Hi,

Heritrix canonicalization routines are not meant to create URLs for
fe=
tching. The main purpose is to use it to filter out URLs that have been
pre=
viously seen and need not be scheduled again. For this purpose you need
to =
bring down the URL to its barebones form which includes lowercasing so
that=
 the Hash signatures of the canonicalized URLs are insensitive to case
diff=
erences.

So in short, Canonicalized URLs are not meant for fetching but on=
ly for Hash
Signature generation for filtering previously seen URLs.

Hope =
this helps.

Anmol
